scripts.build:directives: cd src/directives && tsc -b --clean && npx ibyar  -b -v && cd ../..
scripts.build:forms: cd src/forms && tsc -b --clean && npx ibyar -b -v && cd ../..
scripts.fix-permission: npx rimraf ./node_modules/.bin/ibyar && npm i && npx ibyar -v
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run fix-permission && npm run build:directives && npm run build:forms
scripts.do:publish-no-git: npm run build && npx lerna publish --force-publish --no-git-tag-version --no-push
scripts.do:publish-no-tag: npm run build && npx lerna publish --force-publish --no-git-tag-version
scripts.do:publish-no-push: npm run build && npx lerna publish --force-publish --no-push
scripts.do:publish: npm run build && npx lerna publish --force-publish
